name: enterprise-banking-portal
description: Enterprise Banking Portal with Micro Frontend Architecture

scripts.preinstall: echo 'ðŸš€ Setting up Enterprise Banking Portal...'
scripts.postinstall: echo 'âœ… Setup complete! Run npm run dev:all to start'
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:frontend: cd packages/ui-kit && npm install && cd ../host-app && npm install && cd ../account-overview && npm install && cd ../transaction-details && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:ui-kit && npm run build:host && npm run build:account-overview && npm run build:transaction-details
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "backend,account,transaction,host" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:account-overview" "npm run dev:transaction-details" "npm run dev:host"
scripts.dev:mobile: concurrently -n "backend,account,transaction,host" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "cd packages/account-overview && npm start" "cd packages/transaction-details && npm start" "cd packages/host-app && HOST_IP=192.168.1.100 npm start"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:host && npm run test:account-overview && npm run test:transaction-details
scripts.lint:all: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../packages/host-app && npm run lint && cd ../account-overview && npm run lint && cd ../transaction-details && npm run lint
scripts.format:all: cd backend && npm run format && cd ../packages/host-app && npm run format && cd ../account-overview && npm run format && cd ../transaction-details && npm run format
scripts.clean: npm run clean:builds && npm run clean:cache
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:builds && npm run clean:cache
scripts.fresh-start: npm run clean:all && npm run install:all && npm run build:ui-kit
scripts.health-check: concurrently -s first "curl -f http://localhost:4000/health || exit 1" "curl -f http://localhost:3001 || exit 1" "curl -f http://localhost:3002 || exit 1" "curl -f http://localhost:3000 || exit 1"
scripts.demo:setup: npm run fresh-start && npm run dev:all
scripts.demo:mobile: npm run fresh-start && npm run dev:mobile
